trends: There have been no other sightings in Laurelville
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Very slow and silent object outside of town.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was nearly home, approximately 3.5 miles south of Laurelville on St. Rte. 56. I noticed odd flashing lights moving very slowly north. I was able to pull over and get out and for roughly 5 mins. I observed absolutely no sound what so ever coming from the object. I was close enough to tell that it was not a balloon or anything like that. It was moving at about 20-30 mph. and about 500-600 ft. in the air. The lights were white and a reddish color that flashed intermittently almost in the shape of a delta or triangle. I couldn't tell the shape only that it was close and very creepy as it made no noise at all.
